3: Commandant.
Commandant!!!
I heard a voice in the dark, so I opened my eyes.
We are underneath the Demon General's Castle. I'm so glad that you are awake, Commandant.
This place looked like an underground facility. Lucia and others looked happy and relieved.
Hehe, I was so scared just now. Didn't expect this game to have the bleeding feature. You wouldn't have survived without Karenina's recovery potions.

4: The potions they collected all along...

3: Yeah, two of you dropped from above. Don't you remember?
So you really were collecting the potions... The villagers thought we were bad guys because of that.
Whatever, now that the Commandant of Gray Raven is awake, can we leave this place already?
Karenina walked out of darkness and looked at Lucia. She seemed to be quite upset.
Before taking action, we need to at least explain the situation to Commandant, like why we were here, and what happened.
What a hassle.
Commandant, you just woke up, so you may feel a little weak. You only need to listen.
First of all, just like you expected, we had a fight with the King.
But somehow our attacks didn't work at all. At the most crucial moment, we saw two of you falling down from the castle.
...As well as some bombs left by Camu and Vera.
Those two would do anything just to win...
And you said you wanted to finish us off at the spawn point! You aren't any different!
I don't do cheap shots!
Those bombs seemed to be taken off Demons. Anyway, they landed before the King's attack, so the land blocks all collapsed, and we ended up here.
The bleeding was also from falling. But now you should be fine.

4: What were Vera and Camu thinking...

3: Not yet, but the King probably knows we are here. We can't stay long.
Who knows what those two maniacs were thinking? I'm so going to beat them up next time I see them.
Anyway, a lot of things are still unknown. Commandant, we may belong to different teams, but I think we should move together.
【kuroname】 has joined the team.
What?
What?
What!???
